name: Every Thing Is Broken
description:
Have you ever been thrown through a window into a creepy big room and found yourself looking like a can of beans? No? Well, you will be lucky to have this experience right now. Every Thing Is Broken is a platformer game about not giving up even when everything seems broken, because there's always someone out there kind enough to give a helping hand.

This game was made for the Coding Blocks game jam with the topic, uhm.. "everything is broken". On the day it started I decided to join and give it a try, and eventually I came up with this idea. I'm not a programmer and had just a few days to make this, so it's pretty short, but I might continue working on it in the future, who knows.

Anyways it's been a fun project! I hope you enjoy it ;)
